org.netbeans.spi.editor.bracesmatching

Interface BracesMatcher.ContextLocator

  • Enclosing interface:
    BracesMatcher

    public static interface BracesMatcher.ContextLocator
    Mixin interface, which provides context ranges for brace matches. The interface is expected to be implemented on the BracesMatcher instances produced by BracesMatcherFactory. If implemented, the infrastructure may call the method to obtain additional context for display along with brace highlight. See the BraceContext for more information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BraceContext findContext(int originOrMatchPosition)
      Obtains context for the given text position.

    • Method Detail

      • findContext

        BraceContext findContext(int originOrMatchPosition)
        Obtains context for the given text position. At this moment, only start offset of the origin will be passed in, but the implementation should be prepared to handle (or ignore) each of the starting offsets reported by BracesMatcher.findOrigin() or BracesMatcher.findMatches().

        Note: the document is not read locked by the caller. If the passed position does not exist in the document, or seems obsolete, the SPI should return null.

        Parameters:
        originOrMatchPosition - position of 'origin' or 'match' brace
        Returns:
        context information or null if the context cannot be provided.
